mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_ID , P.BOARD_ID , P.MEMBER_ID , P.POST_TITLE , P.POST_CONTENT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.SORT_NUMBER , P.POST_STATUS , P.INPUT_DT , P.UPDATE_DT , B.BOARD_NAME , B.BOARD_CODE FROM POSTS P JOIN BOARDS B ON P.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY P.INPUT_DT DESC
